scripts.global: echo '=> Installing Global Modules' && npm install -g --save-dev pm2 mocha jshint istanbul markdown-html good-mocha-html-reporter raml2html jsdoc
scripts.test: echo '=> test + coverage' &&  istanbul cover _mocha -- tests/* -R good-mocha-html-reporter
scripts.lint: echo '=> lint:js' && jshint app.js && jshint routes/* && jshint controllers/*
scripts.gather: echo '=> Gathering Docs' &&npm run gather:istanbul && npm run gather:markdown && npm run gather:mocha && npm run gather:raml && npm run gather:jsdoc
scripts.gather:jsdoc: jsdoc controllers/* routes/* app.js  -P package.json -d docs/jsdoc/
scripts.predev: clear && echo '=> Dev - Building' && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run gather
scripts.dev: echo '=> Dev-Mode for App' && node app.js 40123 debug
scripts.deploy: echo '=> Deploying App' && npm install && npm run predev
scripts.start: echo '=> Starting App' && pm2 start app.js --name 01_rcc-data
